== AO: Annotation Ontology ==

The _Annotation Ontology_ is a vocabulary for defining several kind of annotations - comment, entities annotation (or semantic tags), textual annotation (classic tags), notes, erratum... - on potentially any kind of document (text, images, audio...) and document part. 

=== The model ===

 * [Annotation]
 * [Selectors]
 * Curation
 * Annotation Set
 * Document Annotation

=== Related Ontologies ===

AO has been influenced by an analysis of strengths and weaknesses of the [http://www.w3.org/2001/Annotea/ Annotea Project].
